content:
Narrative txt-1 and txt-2 constraints (http://hl7.org/fhir/narrative.profile.json) use some "htmlchecks" function which I don't see defined anywhere in the FHIRPath specification.

Should I file a ticket in GForge to add it to the specification? What should be the behavior of this function (I can probably guess from equivalent XPath, but still...)?

oh - good catch. it should be documented here build.fhir.org/fhirpath.html. And you'd be right to infer it's behavior from the the xpath. can you make a gForge task for us to document it explicitly? thanks
